headline: UK Pension Moves £28 Billion to Amundi, Invesco Citing ESG
summary: (Bloomberg) -- UK pension master trust the People’s Pension has awarded two mandates totaling £28 billion ($35.5 billion) to Amundi SA and Invesco Ltd., citing their sustainability and responsible investment credentials.
